LightningComponentBundle.description: Display the record alerts for a record.

property.name: cardHeaderTitle
property.label: Header Label
property.description: Enter a label to for the header on top of the card.

property.name: flowDeveloperName
property.label: Record Alert Getter Flow
property.description: The Developer Name of the flow which returns the record alerts which you'd like to display. The flow ApiName must start with Record_Alert_Display. The flow must have an input varibale of type string with the name: recordId and an output variable of type RecordAlert list with the name: recordAlerts.

property.name: maximumAlertDisplay
property.label: Enter the maximum Alerts to Display

property.name: importantAlertSeverities
property.label: Important Alert Severities
property.description: Enter a comma seperated list of the developer names of Severities you would like to render as important (red) Alerts.

property.name: massActionFlow
property.label: Mass Action Flow
property.description: The Developer Name of the mass action screen flow to take action on the displayed alerts in bulk. The flow must have an input varibale of type string collection with the name: recordIds.

property.name: massActionlabel
property.label: Button Label for Mass Action
property.description: Enter a label to for the button on top of the card.

property.name: rowButtonLabel
property.label: Button Label for Alert Level Action
property.description: Enter a label for the buttons associated with each alert that has an action configured.
